alert.note: Alert for Inland Miami-Dade County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Miami-Dade County through 445 PM EDT... At 429 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm near Miccosukee Resort, or 11 miles west of Hialeah. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Miccosukee Resort, Tamiami, University Park, Kendale Lakes and Kendall West. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Inland Miami-Dade County; Metropolitan Miami Dade
